name: Fun Times with Nifty (Unfinished)
description:
This is an unfinished remake of a horrible scratch game I made in 2020. I decided to post the unfinished version here, however I do not plan to finish it, but I may work on it in my free time. This was purely a passion project so if I do end up finishing it, I won't charge money. I mean, look at how bad this game is- I'd be a monster making you pay for it!

Instructions: Move your mouse around to look around, and to move your hand. Click on things to interact. Arrow keys to move.
